column5: 6AM tomorrow I will be leaving NE PA for Quebec. This has been a spring practice since my 20's...only 65yr now. Only thing different this year will be I'm going solo. Searched high & low for a partner but no luck.I remember I had a waiting list for these trips but the ole gang has called it quits. I will travel in daylight as night travel alone for me is not a good idea. I'm not too good at dodging upstate NY deer...last year around Watertown our truck lost out to a whitetail. Boooooo. Had to get a rental in the morning and drive back 200 miles to get another truck.Oh well, I am as excited as usually...only wish the better half wasn't so worried. Post a report when I return. FT
Hi Freytown, Have a great tripLarry Mac
Get ready!It's cold, rainy and even snow!I think we can call that a cold front!It's suppose to be like this all week.
Thxs guys...time to hit the road. Andre, I think you need a better weather man...forcast is good.http://weather.gc.ca/forecast/city_e.html?qc-a1&unit=i
Perfect temp. For those walleyes Spwning is late this year.
